CardData.FlavorText:
<line-height=100%><size=200%>S</size>piders dart and skitter all around, dashing between the shadows thrown by the light of your torches. It is clear that they fear the flames, but you know that neither fire nor steel will hold them off forever.
<indent=50></indent>Fickle chance proves this truth when a spider lunges from the shadows. Glimmering droplets of viscous fluid drip from its hideous mandibles as it slashes one of your companions!

Localization.Title: Poisoned!
Localization.Text: A single random Hero suffers 1 damage during Upkeep while on this Quest
